exchange_rate.description: The exchange rate between ustake and utoken, in terms of utoken per ustake

total_ustake.description: Total supply to the Stake token

unlocked_coins.description: Staking rewards currently held by the contract that are ready to be reinvested

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
